cosipy.cpkernel.grid.Grid¶

class cosipy.cpkernel.grid.Grid(layer_heights, layer_densities, layer_temperatures, layer_liquid_water_content)¶
__init__(layer_heights, layer_densities, layer_temperatures, layer_liquid_water_content)¶

The Grid-class controls the numerical mesh.

The grid consists of a list of nodes (layers) that store the information of individual layers. The class provides various setter/getter functions to add, read, overwrite, merge, split, update or re-mesh the layers.

Parameters

  • layer_heights (float) – Height of the snowpack layers [\(m\)]

  • layer_densities (float) – Snow density of the snowpack layers [\(kg~m^{-3}\)]

  • layer_temperatures (float) – Temperatures of the layers [\(K\)]

  • layer_liquid_water_content (float) – Liquid water content of the layers [\(m~w.e.\)]

Returns

Node

Return type

cosipy.cpkernel.grid object
